name: LD Force
description:
Welcome to LD Force, Pilot!

Your mission is to shoot your way through this alien filled tunnel!  Survival will be your reward!  Heck, maybe next mission we'll even spice it up a bit.  We'll see.

Along the way you'll earn extra health for each enemy killed.  But don't get cocky, Pilot!  You'll understand the true meaning of bullet hell along the way!

To help you survive you'll encounter purple upgrade zones.  In these zones your extra health will be converted into money which you can then spend on an upgrade!  But only if you have enough extra health and left over money to afford it!

I'd tell you not to let us down, but after all the other pilots . . . let's just say we warned ya!

Good luck!!

Controls
==========

Best played with a gamepad!  Gamepad used exclusively if plugged in.  So, if you want to use your keyboard, unplug any gamepad.

Gamepad controls:
Leftstick to move ship
A to fire
B to switch weapons

Keyboard controls:
arrow or wasd to move ship
Space to fire
Ctrl to switch weapons
